# init(keysToFetch:)

**Initializer**

Creates a fetch request for the specified keys.

## Declaration

```swift
init(keysToFetch: [any CNKeyDescriptor])
```

## Parameters

- **keysToFetch**: An array of contact property keys and/or key descriptors from contacts objects to be fetched in the returned contacts. For a list of possible keys, see [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/contact-keys].

## Return Value

The initialized [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNContactFetchRequest] instance.

## Discussion

This is the designated initializer for this class. Using `init` raises an exception.

## Creating a Fetch Request

- **CNKeyDescriptor**: This protocol is reserved for Contacts framework usage.
